RelatedSentence: Arnold Pickering was arrested for being unlawfully at large at an address in Oldham , police said .

The 44 - year - old , who was jailed for life in 1991 for killing a man he wrongly thought to be a paedophile , failed to return to HMP Kennet in Merseyside after leaving the Category C jail on day release on Saturday .

RelatedSentence: Merseyside Police said he was arrested by officers from Greater Manchester Police and was last night in custody .
